Title: Requires information concerning services for human trafficking victims to be posted in lactation rooms at truck stops
Summary: Requires information concerning services for human trafficking victims to be posted in lactation rooms at truck stops; defines "lactation room".
LawCode: Amd ยง390-d, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring information concerning services for human trafficking victims to be posted in lactation rooms at truck stops
